Question: Jinxuan Electronics (ShenZhen) Company Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Jinxuan Electronics (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Supplier of electronic information products and intelligent equipment solutions
- Based in Mexico and covering the whole Latin America
- Well-known Latin American trademarks "1HORA" and "Stelau"
- Independent intellectual property rights for the design, packaging, and appearance of products
- Business growth of more than 80% annually
- Sales volume in Mexico market exceeding $100 million, accounting for more than 35% of the local market
- Combination of online retail, offline wholesale, and channel coverage
- Subsidiaries in Shenzhen, Hong Kong, Mexico, Panama, Colombia, Peru, Chile, Brazil, and Africa, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East
- Located in Xinghe WORLD Industrial Park, Minzhi Street, Longhua New District, Shenzhen
- Talent-focused with strategic human resource management and talent capital management mechanism

For more information, visit the international official website.
